title: Dale N. Hatfield Endowment Fund in Technology and Law
description: To provide the Silicon Flatirions Center of the Law School with salary and support for research, teaching, and other interdisciplinary activities related to the public policy implications and challenges of Information and Communications Technologies.
marketingContent: To provide the Silicon Flatirions Center of the Law School with salary and support for research, teaching, and other interdisciplinary activities related to the public policy implications and challenges of Information and Communications Technologies.
